revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | Contest Champion || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Twinleaf Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Mesprit. |- | Professor Rowan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Beachcomber || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sandgem Town]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Manaphy. |- | Flower Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Floaroma Town]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Location-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Eevee into Leafeon. |- | Lass Caroline || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Eterna City]] || Informs the player about the [[Old Chateau|location]] and [[Dungeons#Sinnoh|requirement]] for Rotom and its forms. |- | Construction Worker || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Oreburgh City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Nosepass into Probopass. |- | Contest Fan || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Hearthome City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Magneton into Magnezone. |- | Pal Park Warden || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Pal Park]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Weather-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Cherrim (overcast) into Cherrim (sunny). |- | Riley || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the requirement to evolve Riolu. |- | Young Boy || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Canalave City]] || Informs the player about the Roaming nature of Cresselia. |- | Young Girl || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Snowpoint City]] || Explains the conditions needed to evolve Eevee into Glaceon. |- | Ribboner Julia || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Sunyshore City]] || Explains the [[Sinnoh#Level-dependent_Pokémon|conditions]] needed to evolve Pilowswine into Mamoswine. |- | Ace Trainer Quinn || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Fight Area]] || Informs the player about the requirement to unlock [[Distortion World]]. |- | Hiker Kevin || [[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Survival Area]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
